div.h1: Due to Governor Greg Abbot's Executive order, Lighthouse Charter School will remain closed for the remainder of the 2019/2020 school year
div.span: Distance Learning will continue for all students

div.h5: Please continue to contact your child(ren)’s teacher for information on distance learning options, work assignments and login information for the various websites and apps that Lighthouse Charter School is utilizing during the school closure due to COVID-19.

Teachers have been reaching out to all parents using contact information on file. If you have not been contacted by a teacher or if you have recently changed your phone number or moved please send in your contact informtion to distancelearning@lighthousesa.org or call (210) 876-3020 and we can point you in the right direction.
Please stay safe and continue to monitor our website and social media sites for the most up to date information regarding school closure and general information.

div.a: Click here to see a special message from our Superintendent Dr. Mills

div.p: Lighthouse Charter School is a tuition-free charter school in San Antonio, Texas — home of the Seahawks. We opened in August 2003, and have degreed, certified, and highly qualified administrators, teachers, and paraprofessionals. All students are encouraged to excel in their academic studies through a variety of teaching methods. All students and staff are treated with dignity and respect in a safe environment.

Our vision is that each student who comes to the school will be educated to his/her maximum potential, will have a positive self-image reflected in good citizenship and will have a positive view of the future. We believe this can be done in a safe, rewarding environment.

Lighthouse Charter School develops academically, socially, emotionally, and physically skilled students capable of functioning successfully in a changing world. This is accomplished by providing a safe, proper, and conducive learning environment.
Our campus is the right place for your child to learn and grow. We want you to see exactly what happens here, and how your family will fit right in.
